argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nn0z | |- ( N e. NN0 -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_gcdid0 | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( N gcd 0 ) = ( abs ` N ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( N gcd 0 ) = ( abs ` N ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nn0re | |- ( N e. NN0 -> N e. RR ) |
| 5 |  | #P_nn0ge0 | |- ( N e. NN0 -> 0 <_ N ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_absidd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( abs ` N ) = N ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( N gcd 0 ) = N ) |
